to.sven.androidrccar.common.test.communication

Class RemoteCommunicationTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • AndroidTestCase
      • to.sven.androidrccar.common.test.communication.RemoteCommunicationTest

  • public class RemoteCommunicationTest
extends AndroidTestCase
    This class should test the behavior of the RemoteCommunication and it's @{link MessageListenerThread}.
    Author:
    sven

      • testSendMessage

        public void testSendMessage()
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Tests RemoteCommunication.sendMessage(to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model.Message). Sends two messages to the mock communication partner.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Test failed.

      • testReciveMessage

        public void testReciveMessage()
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Tests the IRemoteCommunicationListener.messageReceived(to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model.Message) callback and RemoteCommunication.startMessageListener(): - Start MessageListenerThread - "Send" two message through pseudo stream - "Close" the stream after that - Mock of IRemoteCommunicationListener checks that the correct callback are called.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Test failed.

      • testClose

        public void testClose()
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks, if the Socket is closed on RemoteCommunication.close(). It also checks if the MessageListenerThread will be closed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Test failed.

      • testClose_alreadyClosed

        public void testClose_alreadyClosed()
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks, if the Socket isn't closed, when it's closed. It also checks if the MessageListenerThread will be closed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Test failed.

      • testClose_ioException

        public void testClose_ioException()
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks if the IOException is rethrown on close. It also checks if the MessageListenerThread will be closed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Couldn't thrown in configure.
